casebody.data:
Suzanne RUBBA and Daniel LeBlanc, Personal Representatives for the Estate of Patricia E. LeBlanc, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
Eugene J. AGNONE, M.D., and Michigan Cancer Specialists, PLC, Defendants-Appellees,
and
Chakrpani Ranganathan, M.D., Michael F. Romanelli, M.D., Macomb Neurology Associates, PC, and Woods Cardiovascular Internal Medicine Associates, PC, Defendants. SC: 156317
COA: 330330 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 28, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the July 6, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.

Bernstein, J., would grant leave to appeal.

Viviano, J., did not participate due to a familial relationship with the presiding circuit court judge in this case.
